column2: BRIEF-Orion Engineered Carbons Qtrly Adjusted EPS $0.52 May 17 (Reuters) - Orion Engineered Carbons SA: * ORION ENGINEERED CARBONS SA - QTRLY REVENUE INCREASED BY $82.6 MILLION TO $406.7 MILLION COMPARED TO THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2017 * ORION ENGINEERED CARBONS SA - QTRLY TOTAL VOLUMES INCREASED BY 4.0% TO 286.1 KMT * ORION ENGINEERED CARBONS SA - INCREASING OUTLOOK FOR FULL YEAR ADJUSTED EBITDA TO BETWEEN $280 MILLION AND $300 MILLION Source text: (bit.ly/2rQdao9) Further company coverage:
